Text: Mila Parély (7 October 1917 – 14 January 2012) was a French actress of Polish ancestry best known for the roles of Félicie, Belle's eldest sister, in Jean Cocteau's "La Belle et la Bête" (1946), and as Geneviève in "La Règle du jeu" (1939).
